fruitsAndVeggiesCatalogue.title: Cilantro
fruitsAndVeggiesCatalogue.content: Cilantro is best planted in the early spring but also can be started in fall. It grows quickly, often yielding its first harvest of leaves within 30 days. Its seeds will be ready for harvest closer to three months from planting.

fruitsAndVeggiesCatalogue.title: Chard
fruitsAndVeggiesCatalogue.content: Typically grown as a cool-season crop because it grows quickly and easily during the cooler temperatures of spring and fall, chard is quite tolerant of hotter temperatures, too. Its growth will slow down in summer, but chardâ€™s higher heat tolerance makes it a great salad green to grow when it gets too hot out for the others.

fruitsAndVeggiesCatalogue.title: Turnip
fruitsAndVeggiesCatalogue.content: Turnips are a cool-season crop that can grow quite large and require minimal maintenance. They need well-draining soil, regular watering, and occasional fertilizing.

fruitsAndVeggiesCatalogue.title: Beets
fruitsAndVeggiesCatalogue.content: Beets are a cool-season crop that can grow quite large and require minimal maintenance. They need well-draining soil, regular watering, and occasional fertilizing.

fruitsAndVeggiesCatalogue.title: Garlic
fruitsAndVeggiesCatalogue.content: Garlic is a cool-season crop that can grow quite large and requires minimal maintenance. They need well-draining soil, occasional watering, and occasional fertilizing.

fruitsAndVeggiesCatalogue.title: Lettuce
fruitsAndVeggiesCatalogue.content: Lettuce is another fast-growing vegetable that can be grown in small spaces. It requires little maintenance and can be harvested when the leaves are young and tender.

fruitsAndVeggiesCatalogue.title: Strawberries
fruitsAndVeggiesCatalogue.content: Plant your strawberries in a sunny spot with well-draining soil, water regularly, and fertilize monthly.

fruitsAndVeggiesCatalogue.title: Blueberries
fruitsAndVeggiesCatalogue.content: Blueberries grow best in acidic soil with a pH between 4.0 and 5.5, full sun exposure, and consistent moisture.

fruitsAndVeggiesCatalogue.title: Blackberries
fruitsAndVeggiesCatalogue.content: Plant blackberries in well-drained soil in a sunny location, prune regularly, and provide adequate water and fertilization for healthy growth.

fruitsAndVeggiesCatalogue.title: Raspberries
fruitsAndVeggiesCatalogue.content: Plant raspberries in well-drained soil, prune annually, and provide ample sunlight and water for optimal growth.

fruitsAndVeggiesCatalogue.title: Tomatoes
fruitsAndVeggiesCatalogue.content: Plant tomatoes in a sunny location with well-draining soil, water them consistently, fertilize regularly, and prune the plants to promote airflow and prevent disease.

fruitsAndVeggiesCatalogue.title: Peppers
fruitsAndVeggiesCatalogue.content: Plant peppers in a location with full sun exposure, well-draining soil, and consistent watering while fertilizing them regularly.

fruitsAndVeggiesCatalogue.title: Cucumbers
fruitsAndVeggiesCatalogue.content: Plant cucumber seeds or seedlings in well-draining soil, in a location with full sun exposure, and provide consistent moisture and fertilization throughout the growing season.

fruitsAndVeggiesCatalogue.title: Quince
fruitsAndVeggiesCatalogue.content: Quinces grow best in well-draining soil with full sun exposure, and require regular watering and pruning to produce healthy fruit.

fruitsAndVeggiesCatalogue.title: Mulberries
fruitsAndVeggiesCatalogue.content: Mulberries thrive in full sun and well-drained soil, and benefit from annual pruning to promote air circulation and fruit production.

fruitsAndVeggiesCatalogue.title: Apricots
fruitsAndVeggiesCatalogue.content: Plant apricots in well-draining soil in a sunny spot, water them deeply but infrequently, and prune them regularly to promote fruit production.

fruitsAndVeggiesCatalogue.title: Plums
fruitsAndVeggiesCatalogue.content: Plant plum trees in a sunny, well-drained location with fertile soil, and prune regularly to promote healthy growth and fruit production.

fruitsAndVeggiesCatalogue.title: Cherries
fruitsAndVeggiesCatalogue.content: Plant cherry trees in well-drained soil, in a sunny location with good air circulation, and prune them regularly to encourage fruit production.

fruitsAndVeggiesCatalogue.title: Apples
fruitsAndVeggiesCatalogue.content: Choose a sunny location with well-drained soil, plant disease-resistant varieties, prune regularly, and fertilize appropriately to grow healthy and productive apple trees.

fruitsAndVeggiesCatalogue.title: Cantaloupe
fruitsAndVeggiesCatalogue.content: Plant cantaloupe seeds in well-draining soil with full sun exposure, provide consistent moisture, and fertilize regularly for optimal growth.

fruitsAndVeggiesCatalogue.title: Nectarine
fruitsAndVeggiesCatalogue.content: Plant nectarine trees in a sunny location with well-draining soil, prune regularly, and protect from pests and diseases.

fruitsAndVeggiesCatalogue.title: Pomegranate
fruitsAndVeggiesCatalogue.content: Plant pomegranate in well-draining soil, provide full sun exposure, and water deeply once a week during the growing season.

fruitsAndVeggiesCatalogue.title: Grapes
fruitsAndVeggiesCatalogue.content: Plant grapes in well-draining soil, provide adequate sunlight and water, prune regularly, and protect from pests and diseases.

fruitsAndVeggiesCatalogue.title: Cranberries
fruitsAndVeggiesCatalogue.content: Cranberries require acidic soil, consistent moisture, and good drainage to grow successfully.

fruitsAndVeggiesCatalogue.title: Persimmons
fruitsAndVeggiesCatalogue.content: Plant persimmons in well-draining soil with plenty of sunlight and water regularly, especially during fruit development.

fruitsAndVeggiesCatalogue.title: Pears
fruitsAndVeggiesCatalogue.content: Plant pear trees in a location with well-draining soil and full sun exposure, and regularly prune to encourage strong, healthy growth and optimal fruit production.

fruitsAndVeggiesCatalogue.title: Gooseberries
fruitsAndVeggiesCatalogue.content: Plant gooseberries in well-draining soil with plenty of sunlight, keep the soil consistently moist, and prune annually to promote growth and fruit production.

fruitsAndVeggiesCatalogue.title: Figs
fruitsAndVeggiesCatalogue.content: Figs grow best in a warm, sunny location with well-draining soil, regular watering and pruning, and protection from pests and diseases.

fruitsAndVeggiesCatalogue.title: Lime
fruitsAndVeggiesCatalogue.content: Plant lime trees in well-draining soil, in a location with full sun and protection from strong winds, and water regularly while allowing the soil to dry out slightly between watering.

fruitsAndVeggiesCatalogue.title: Kiwi
fruitsAndVeggiesCatalogue.content: Plant kiwi in well-drained soil, provide adequate support for the vine to climb, and ensure that it gets full sun exposure while being protected from harsh winds.

fruitsAndVeggiesCatalogue.title: Watermelon
fruitsAndVeggiesCatalogue.content: Watermelon thrives in warm temperatures, needs plenty of sun and water, and should be planted in well-draining soil with plenty of space for the vines to spread.

fruitsAndVeggiesCatalogue.title: Honeydew
fruitsAndVeggiesCatalogue.content: Plant honeydew seeds in well-draining soil with full sun exposure and water regularly, but avoid overwatering.

fruitsAndVeggiesCatalogue.title: Passionfruit
fruitsAndVeggiesCatalogue.content: Plant passionfruit in well-draining soil, provide adequate water and sunlight, and prune regularly to promote healthy growth and fruit production.

fruitsAndVeggiesCatalogue.title: Olives
fruitsAndVeggiesCatalogue.content: Olives thrive in well-drained soil, lots of sunlight, and moderate temperatures, so plant them in a sunny spot with good drainage and protect them from extreme cold or hot temperatures.
